name: Survive the Night!
description:
What happened?

In a world where the zombies invaded the entire planet, there are a few people that managed to survive and defend themselves against these creatures.

There are some rumours tho: a secret safe place where zombies aren't around, The Bunker 1.2.9.6.

It's midnight, you are driving  an old damaged van, you're so close but... oh my gosh, a zombie appeared in the middle of the road and both of you had an accident!

You somehow manage to enter the woods with a gun... it's time to Survive the Night! -What's the main goal?-

You only have one: kill all the zombies and escape by going to the bunker!

-Characters-

-Eddie the Zombie: Be careful with this little zombie, he wants to eat your brain so bad! If you are near to him, he'll chase you until his death!

-Romero the Big: If you see this big bad boy... run for your life. His big strengh and intelligence will make your adventure much more difficult.

-You, the Player: With only a gun and three liver, you'll have to find the refugee by walking into the dark and skary woods.
